antimage_mana_break.name: Mana Break
antimage_mana_break.description: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.

antimage_blink.name: Blink
antimage_blink.description: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.

antimage_counterspell.name: Counterspell
antimage_counterspell.description: With the proper focus, Anti-Mage turns innate resistance into calculated retaliation.

antimage_mana_void.name: Mana Void
antimage_mana_void.description: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.

axe_berserkers_call.name: Berserker's Call
axe_berserkers_call.description: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.

axe_battle_hunger.name: Battle Hunger
axe_battle_hunger.description: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.

axe_counter_helix.name: Counter Helix
axe_counter_helix.description: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.

axe_culling_blade.name: Culling Blade
axe_culling_blade.description: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.

bane_enfeeble.name: Enfeeble
bane_enfeeble.description: Each tendril of fear that Atropos weaves increases the vulnerability of his victims to arcane and unknown arts.

bane_brain_sap.name: Brain Sap
bane_brain_sap.description: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.

bane_nightmare.name: Nightmare
bane_nightmare.description: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.

bane_fiends_grip.name: Fiend's Grip
bane_fiends_grip.description: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.

bloodseeker_bloodrage.name: Bloodrage
bloodseeker_bloodrage.description: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.

bloodseeker_blood_bath.name: Blood Rite
bloodseeker_blood_bath.description: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.

bloodseeker_thirst.name: Thirst
bloodseeker_thirst.description: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.

bloodseeker_rupture.name: Rupture
bloodseeker_rupture.description: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.

crystal_maiden_crystal_nova.name: Crystal Nova
crystal_maiden_crystal_nova.description: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.

crystal_maiden_frostbite.name: Frostbite
crystal_maiden_frostbite.description: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.

crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura.name: Arcane Aura
crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura.description: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.

crystal_maiden_freezing_field.name: Freezing Field
crystal_maiden_freezing_field.description: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.

drow_ranger_frost_arrows.name: Frost Arrows
drow_ranger_frost_arrows.description: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.

drow_ranger_wave_of_silence.name: Gust
drow_ranger_wave_of_silence.description: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.

drow_ranger_multishot.name: Multishot
drow_ranger_multishot.description: In the ranger's youth, learning to fire multiple arrows at once was considered a distracting frivolity. In the war of the Ancients, such technique has become strange necessity.

drow_ranger_marksmanship.name: Marksmanship
drow_ranger_marksmanship.description: The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.

earthshaker_fissure.name: Fissure
earthshaker_fissure.description: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.

earthshaker_enchant_totem.name: Enchant Totem
earthshaker_enchant_totem.description: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.

earthshaker_aftershock.name: Aftershock
earthshaker_aftershock.description: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.

earthshaker_echo_slam.name: Echo Slam
earthshaker_echo_slam.description: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.

juggernaut_blade_fury.name: Blade Fury
juggernaut_blade_fury.description: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.

juggernaut_healing_ward.name: Healing Ward
juggernaut_healing_ward.description: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.

juggernaut_blade_dance.name: Blade Dance
juggernaut_blade_dance.description: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.

juggernaut_omni_slash.name: Omnislash
juggernaut_omni_slash.description: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'

mirana_starfall.name: Starstorm
mirana_starfall.description: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.

mirana_arrow.name: Sacred Arrow
mirana_arrow.description: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.

mirana_leap.name: Leap
mirana_leap.description: None can fail to recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.

mirana_invis.name: Moonlight Shadow
mirana_invis.description: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.

nevermore_necromastery.name: Necromastery
nevermore_necromastery.description: Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.

nevermore_dark_lord.name: Presence of the Dark Lord
nevermore_dark_lord.description: Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.

nevermore_requiem.name: Requiem of Souls
nevermore_requiem.description: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.

morphling_waveform.name: Waveform
morphling_waveform.description: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.

morphling_adaptive_strike_agi.name: Adaptive Strike (Agility)
morphling_adaptive_strike_agi.description: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.

morphling_adaptive_strike_str.name: Adaptive Strike (Strength)
morphling_adaptive_strike_str.description: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.

morphling_morph_agi.name: Attribute Shift (Agility Gain)
morphling_morph_agi.description: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.

morphling_morph_str.name: Attribute Shift (Strength Gain)
morphling_morph_str.description: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.

morphling_replicate.name: Morph
morphling_replicate.description: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.

phantom_lancer_spirit_lance.name: Spirit Lance
phantom_lancer_spirit_lance.description: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.

phantom_lancer_doppelwalk.name: Doppelganger
phantom_lancer_doppelwalk.description: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to bend and fracture all spectrums of light.

phantom_lancer_phantom_edge.name: Phantom Rush
phantom_lancer_phantom_edge.description: Azwraith knows that on the field of battle, speed can mean everything.

phantom_lancer_juxtapose.name: Juxtapose
phantom_lancer_juxtapose.description: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four...

puck_illusory_orb.name: Illusory Orb
puck_illusory_orb.description: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.

puck_waning_rift.name: Waning Rift
puck_waning_rift.description: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.

puck_phase_shift.name: Phase Shift
puck_phase_shift.description: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.

puck_dream_coil.name: Dream Coil
puck_dream_coil.description: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.

pudge_meat_hook.name: Meat Hook
pudge_meat_hook.description: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.

pudge_rot.name: Rot
pudge_rot.description: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.

pudge_flesh_heap.name: Flesh Heap
pudge_flesh_heap.description: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'

pudge_dismember.name: Dismember
pudge_dismember.description: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'

razor_plasma_field.name: Plasma Field
razor_plasma_field.description: The Lightning Revenant rules the Underscape with plasmatic power.

razor_static_link.name: Static Link
razor_static_link.description: Razor's polarity channels electricity into his being, draining the power of his opposition.

razor_unstable_current.name: Storm Surge
razor_unstable_current.description: Merely approaching the Lightning Revenant is rewarded with shock therapy.

special_bonus_unique_razor_2.description: -0.1s Eye of the Storm Strike Interval

sandking_burrowstrike.name: Burrowstrike
sandking_burrowstrike.description: Crixalis often lies in wait, burrowing under the surface to ambush his adversaries.

sandking_sand_storm.name: Sand Storm
sandking_sand_storm.description: Some say Crixalis is a mirage; his carapace appearing then vanishing between the whirling sands of the Scintillant Waste.

sandking_caustic_finale.name: Caustic Finale
sandking_caustic_finale.description: An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.

sandking_epicenter.name: Epicenter
sandking_epicenter.description: Many an explorer was lost to the quicksands of the Scintillant Waste.

storm_spirit_static_remnant.name: Static Remnant
storm_spirit_static_remnant.description: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.

storm_spirit_electric_vortex.name: Electric Vortex
storm_spirit_electric_vortex.description: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.

special_bonus_unique_storm_spirit_4.description: 550 Distance Auto Remnant in Ball Lightning

sven_storm_bolt.name: Storm Hammer
sven_storm_bolt.description: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.

sven_great_cleave.name: Great Cleave
sven_great_cleave.description: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.

sven_warcry.name: Warcry
sven_warcry.description: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!

sven_gods_strength.name: God's Strength
sven_gods_strength.description: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.

tiny_avalanche.name: Avalanche
tiny_avalanche.description: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.

tiny_toss.name: Toss
tiny_toss.description: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors.

tiny_tree_channel.name: Tree Volley
tiny_tree_channel.description: Sticks thrown from stones are like to shatter many bones.

tiny_grow.name: Grow
tiny_grow.description: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries.

tiny_toss_tree.name: Tree Throw
tiny_toss_tree.description: Even enemies can share in Tiny's arbor ardor.

vengefulspirit_magic_missile.name: Magic Missile
vengefulspirit_magic_missile.description: A simple Skywrath technique, the magic missile is Shendel's primary tool for vengeance.

vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror.name: Wave of Terror
vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror.description: Shendel's haunting voice hints at her approaching vindication.

vengefulspirit_command_aura.name: Vengeance Aura
vengefulspirit_command_aura.description: Although they may not share her undying passion for revenge, allies do draw on her fanaticism in combat.

vengefulspirit_nether_swap.name: Nether Swap
vengefulspirit_nether_swap.description: Martyrdom is a small price to pay for vengeance.

windrunner_shackleshot.name: Shackleshot
windrunner_shackleshot.description: Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.

windrunner_powershot.name: Powershot
windrunner_powershot.description: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.

windrunner_windrun.name: Windrun
windrunner_windrun.description: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.

windrunner_gale_force.name: Gale Force
windrunner_gale_force.description: At last Lyralei has learned to call upon the might of her true birthright.

windrunner_focusfire.name: Focus Fire
windrunner_focusfire.description: Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.

special_bonus_unique_windranger_2.description: Focus Fire Kills Advance Cooldown by 20s.

zuus_arc_lightning.name: Arc Lightning
zuus_arc_lightning.description: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.

zuus_lightning_bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
zuus_lightning_bolt.description: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.

zuus_static_field.name: Static Field
zuus_static_field.description: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.

zuus_thundergods_wrath.name: Thundergod's Wrath
zuus_thundergods_wrath.description: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.

kunkka_torrent.name: Torrent
kunkka_torrent.description: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.

kunkka_tidebringer.name: Tidebringer
kunkka_tidebringer.description: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.

kunkka_x_marks_the_spot.name: X Marks the Spot
kunkka_x_marks_the_spot.description: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.

kunkka_torrent_storm.name: Torrent Storm
kunkka_torrent_storm.description: A hundred leagues of dry land couldn't keep these seas at bay.

kunkka_ghostship.name: Ghostship
kunkka_ghostship.description: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.

lina_dragon_slave.name: Dragon Slave
lina_dragon_slave.description: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.

lina_light_strike_array.name: Light Strike Array
lina_light_strike_array.description: Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.

lina_fiery_soul.name: Fiery Soul
lina_fiery_soul.description: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.

lina_laguna_blade.name: Laguna Blade
lina_laguna_blade.description: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.

lich_frost_nova.name: Frost Blast
lich_frost_nova.description: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.

lich_frost_shield.name: Frost Shield
lich_frost_shield.description: First conceived of to protect him in his mortal years, the frost magic that Ethreain weaves around himself has only grown colder with time.

lich_chain_frost.name: Chain Frost
lich_chain_frost.description: Almost universally considered the ultimate in frost magic, Ethreain's orb of frozen death strikes fear into those who dare stand against him.

lion_impale.name: Earth Spike
lion_impale.description: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.

lion_voodoo.name: Hex
lion_voodoo.description: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.

lion_mana_drain.name: Mana Drain
lion_mana_drain.description: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.

lion_finger_of_death.name: Finger of Death
lion_finger_of_death.description: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.

special_bonus_unique_lion_11.description: +70 Max Health Per Finger of Death Kill

special_bonus_unique_lion_8.description: +20 Finger of Death Damage Per Kill

shadow_shaman_ether_shock.name: Ether Shock
shadow_shaman_ether_shock.description: Originally used to open shows with the travelling con-man, Rhasta's lightning display shocks adversaries in more ways than one.

shadow_shaman_voodoo.name: Hex
shadow_shaman_voodoo.description: Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.

shadow_shaman_shackles.name: Shackles
shadow_shaman_shackles.description: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.

shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward.name: Mass Serpent Ward
shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward.description: Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.

slardar_sprint.name: Guardian Sprint
slardar_sprint.description: As Slardar has made the transition from the Deeps, it has been necessary to use his powerful tail for sprinting instead of swimming.

slardar_slithereen_crush.name: Slithereen Crush
slardar_slithereen_crush.description: A swift crush of might and water breaks even the toughest of defenses.

slardar_bash.name: Bash of the Deep
slardar_bash.description: Thieves of the wealth of the Deep Ones meet the brutality of the Slithereen Guard in melee combat.

slardar_amplify_damage.name: Corrosive Haze
slardar_amplify_damage.description: Even the strongest armor counts for little when left to the brine of the sea.

tidehunter_gush.name: Gush
tidehunter_gush.description: During his championship of the Sunken Isles, Leviathan gained mastery over the open sea.

tidehunter_kraken_shell.name: Kraken Shell
tidehunter_kraken_shell.description: Claddish navymen tell tales of a mighty sea-faring beast that suffered spear and sword but continued to lay waste to the fleet.

tidehunter_anchor_smash.name: Anchor Smash
tidehunter_anchor_smash.description: Stolen from one of Admiral Kunkka's flagships, Leviathan's heavy anchor proves useful as a melee weapon.

tidehunter_ravage.name: Ravage
tidehunter_ravage.description: Calling to the abyssal god Maelrawn has resulted in entire armadas being lost at sea.

special_bonus_unique_tidehunter_8.description: 50% chance of Anchor Smash on attack

witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask.name: Paralyzing Cask
witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask.description: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.

witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration.name: Voodoo Restoration
witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration.description: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.

witch_doctor_maledict.name: Maledict
witch_doctor_maledict.description: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.

witch_doctor_death_ward.name: Death Ward
witch_doctor_death_ward.description: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.

riki_smoke_screen.name: Smoke Screen
riki_smoke_screen.description: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.

riki_blink_strike.name: Blink Strike
riki_blink_strike.description: The Stealth Assassin's agile movement makes him impossible to escape.

riki_tricks_of_the_trade.name: Tricks of the Trade
riki_tricks_of_the_trade.description: The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.

enigma_malefice.name: Malefice
enigma_malefice.description: Strange gravities pull at the core of those who would oppose you, holding them in place.

enigma_demonic_conversion.name: Demonic Conversion
enigma_demonic_conversion.description: Enigma is capable of drawing aspects of himself from other dimensions - the result is a trio of dark eidolons that hunt the corporeal plane.

enigma_midnight_pulse.name: Midnight Pulse
enigma_midnight_pulse.description: A section of the world slowly descends into the void.

enigma_black_hole.name: Black Hole
enigma_black_hole.description: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.

tinker_laser.name: Laser
tinker_laser.description: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.

tinker_heat_seeking_missile.name: Heat-Seeking Missile
tinker_heat_seeking_missile.description: The last contraption Boush was able to save was a retrofitted rocket launcher with a homing mechanism.

tinker_march_of_the_machines.name: March of the Machines
tinker_march_of_the_machines.description: Even though the laboratory has since been sealed off, the ability to radio in robotic drones is still in working order.

tinker_keen_teleport.name: Keen Conveyance
tinker_keen_teleport.description: As Boush likes to say, 'There is nothing the arcane can accomplish that the curious mind cannot reproduce given time. And proper funding, of course.'

tinker_rearm.name: Rearm
tinker_rearm.description: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.

sniper_shrapnel.name: Shrapnel
sniper_shrapnel.description: Kardel's modular rifle also fires incendiary rounds, useful for assaulting entrenched locations.

sniper_headshot.name: Headshot
sniper_headshot.description: Taking potshots at steepstalkers in his childhood has been thoroughly refined into perfect leads on enemy combatants.

sniper_take_aim.name: Take Aim
sniper_take_aim.description: Kardel always takes it upon himself to stay as far from harm as he can while still performing his role - taking perfect aim.

sniper_assassinate.name: Assassinate
sniper_assassinate.description: In order to fulfill the prophecy and return to his home town, Kardel must make another shot as perfect as the one on the day of his ancient test.

necrolyte_death_pulse.name: Death Pulse
necrolyte_death_pulse.description: Poor souls who succumb to Rotund'jere's plagues are recycled for future use.

necrolyte_sadist.name: Ghost Shroud
necrolyte_sadist.description: Rotund'jere uses the souls of his victims as bridge from life to afterlife.

necrolyte_heartstopper_aura.name: Heartstopper Aura
necrolyte_heartstopper_aura.description: Those who come within a short distance of Necrophos can feel pestilence and plague in the air.

necrolyte_reapers_scythe.name: Reaper's Scythe
necrolyte_reapers_scythe.description: The amount of death and suffering in the air increases the power of Necrophos's plague magic.

warlock_fatal_bonds.name: Fatal Bonds
warlock_fatal_bonds.description: An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.

warlock_shadow_word.name: Shadow Word
warlock_shadow_word.description: Demnok's arcane arts have a myriad of uses, allowing them to be powerful friendly enchantments or damaging curses.

warlock_upheaval.name: Upheaval
warlock_upheaval.description: Demnok manipulates space-time, impairing entire armies.

warlock_rain_of_chaos.name: Chaotic Offering
warlock_rain_of_chaos.description: Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.

special_bonus_unique_warlock_10.description: +10 Upheaval Attack Speed per second on Allies

special_bonus_unique_warlock_1.description: 80% Magic Resistance for Chaotic Offering Golems

beastmaster_wild_axes.name: Wild Axes
beastmaster_wild_axes.description: While learning to maneuver in nature alone, the Beastmaster also mastered the use of a pair of tomahawks, adept at cutting down trees as well as adversaries.

beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar.name: Call of the Wild Boar
beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar.description: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_hawk.name: Call of the Wild Hawk
beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_hawk.description: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

beastmaster_inner_beast.name: Inner Beast
beastmaster_inner_beast.description: Beastmaster's ability to incite the innate strength of animals was seen in the mauling of the king of Slom.

beastmaster_primal_roar.name: Primal Roar
beastmaster_primal_roar.description: The Beastmaster has learned to channel his primal instincts into an animalistic roar, causing devastation in the ranks of enemies.

special_bonus_unique_beastmaster_9.description: +2.5% Wild Axes Damage Amp Per Stack

queenofpain_shadow_strike.name: Shadow Strike
queenofpain_shadow_strike.description: Akasha's envenomed dagger allows her to delight in the drawn out suffering of her victims.

queenofpain_blink.name: Blink
queenofpain_blink.description: The Secret Queen lives up to her title, making her pain impossible to escape.

queenofpain_scream_of_pain.name: Scream Of Pain
queenofpain_scream_of_pain.description: The sultry voice of Akasha beckons her opponents while stealing their souls.

queenofpain_sonic_wave.name: Sonic Wave
queenofpain_sonic_wave.description: Her most exquisite of all of torments, Akasha's Sonic Wave puts her poor foes out of their misery.

venomancer_venomous_gale.name: Venomous Gale
venomancer_venomous_gale.description: A concoction of various stings, poisons, and toxins gathered from the jungles of Jidi Isle, victims surviving it are rare.

venomancer_poison_sting.name: Poison Sting
venomancer_poison_sting.description: The paralytic sting of the creature which caused his transformation now belongs to the Venomancer.

venomancer_plague_ward.name: Plague Ward
venomancer_plague_ward.description: A mixture of his old herbalist talents and newfound toxic mastery creates a living embodiment of plague.

venomancer_poison_nova.name: Poison Nova
venomancer_poison_nova.description: In the Acid Jungles, creatures releasing noxious poison to their attackers is common; Venomancer spreads this plague beyond the Jidi Isle.

faceless_void_time_walk.name: Time Walk
faceless_void_time_walk.description: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.

faceless_void_time_lock.name: Time Lock
faceless_void_time_lock.description: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.

faceless_void_chronosphere.name: Chronosphere
faceless_void_chronosphere.description: When a rift opens to Claszureme, all poor souls caught within will likely never return.

skeleton_king_hellfire_blast.name: Wraithfire Blast
skeleton_king_hellfire_blast.description: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.

skeleton_king_vampiric_aura.name: Vampiric Spirit
skeleton_king_vampiric_aura.description: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.

skeleton_king_mortal_strike.name: Mortal Strike
skeleton_king_mortal_strike.description: One blow to crush a foe.

skeleton_king_reincarnation.name: Reincarnation
skeleton_king_reincarnation.description: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.

death_prophet_carrion_swarm.name: Crypt Swarm
death_prophet_carrion_swarm.description: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.

death_prophet_silence.name: Silence
death_prophet_silence.description: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.

death_prophet_exorcism.name: Exorcism
death_prophet_exorcism.description: Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.

phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger.name: Stifling Dagger
phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger.description: The first skill learned by the Sisters of the Veil often signals an incoming hit.

phantom_assassin_phantom_strike.name: Phantom Strike
phantom_assassin_phantom_strike.description: Mortred's silken veil is the last thing her unfortunate target sees.

phantom_assassin_blur.name: Blur
phantom_assassin_blur.description: Meditation allows a Veiled Sister to carefully anticipate her opponents in combat.

phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace.name: Coup de Grace
phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace.description: A divine strike, Mortred honors her opponent by choosing them for death.

pugna_nether_blast.name: Nether Blast
pugna_nether_blast.description: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.

pugna_decrepify.name: Decrepify
pugna_decrepify.description: A now-mastered relic from his childhood, Pugna delights in banishing others into the Nether Realm, whether for good, evil, or simple enjoyment.

pugna_nether_ward.name: Nether Ward
pugna_nether_ward.description: While at the lamasery for the Arts of Oblivion, Pugna learned to dominate his classmates with a simple ward charged with Nether magic.

pugna_life_drain.name: Life Drain
pugna_life_drain.description: Pugna has truly become more powerful than even the grandmaster of Oblivion.

templar_assassin_refraction.name: Refraction
templar_assassin_refraction.description: Manipulating her psionic veil, Lanaya bends nature's law to her will.

templar_assassin_meld.name: Meld
templar_assassin_meld.description: Lanaya is as elusive as her covenant with the Hidden Temple.

templar_assassin_psi_blades.name: Psi Blades
templar_assassin_psi_blades.description: Her blades pierce the skin as much as the mind, furthering her understanding of the mystery that is reality.

templar_assassin_trap_teleport.name: Psionic Projection
templar_assassin_trap_teleport.description: In reward for her service, Lanaya has been granted access to secrets that unlock new techniques for her psionic gifts.

templar_assassin_psionic_trap.name: Psionic Trap
templar_assassin_psionic_trap.description: Calling upon the reach of the Hidden Temple, none escape the eye of the Templar.

viper_poison_attack.name: Poison Attack
viper_poison_attack.description: The Netherdrake's inborn toxic breath quickly drains the vitality of its afflicted.

viper_nethertoxin.name: Nethertoxin
viper_nethertoxin.description: Poison from the Nether Reaches turns wounds into fatalities, and fatigue into death.

viper_corrosive_skin.name: Corrosive Skin
viper_corrosive_skin.description: It is not unusual for sword and shield alike to corrode in the very hands of those who attack the Netherdrake.

viper_viper_strike.name: Viper Strike
viper_viper_strike.description: Once used to slay his sadistic summoner, the most powerful of Netherdrake infections spreads through the veins of those foolish enough to cross Viper.

luna_lucent_beam.name: Lucent Beam
luna_lucent_beam.description: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.

luna_moon_glaive.name: Moon Glaives
luna_moon_glaive.description: Carefully sharpened, Luna's boomerang-like weapon cuts a wide swath through enemy numbers.

luna_lunar_blessing.name: Lunar Blessing
luna_lunar_blessing.description: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.

luna_eclipse.name: Eclipse
luna_eclipse.description: In times of great need, Selemene herself descends into the world, blocking out the light and hope of the opposed.

dragon_knight_breathe_fire.name: Breathe Fire
dragon_knight_breathe_fire.description: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.

dragon_knight_dragon_tail.name: Dragon Tail
dragon_knight_dragon_tail.description: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.

dragon_knight_dragon_blood.name: Dragon Blood
dragon_knight_dragon_blood.description: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.

dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form.name: Elder Dragon Form
dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form.description: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.

special_bonus_unique_dragon_knight_8.description: +375 AoE Dragon Tail During Elder Dragon Form

dazzle_poison_touch.name: Poison Touch
dazzle_poison_touch.description: One of the few Dezun rites used for offensive purposes, the paralytic enchantment often proves useful.

dazzle_shallow_grave.name: Shallow Grave
dazzle_shallow_grave.description: Only a seasoned acolyte of the Shadow can properly perform the rite of preventing death.

dazzle_shadow_wave.name: Shadow Wave
dazzle_shadow_wave.description: While it is a simplistic and routine rite among Shadow Priests, the Shadow Wave is also the most critical for success.

dazzle_bad_juju.name: Bad Juju
dazzle_bad_juju.description: Each invocation of the Nothl realm helps it further permeate the surroundings of our own.

rattletrap_battery_assault.name: Battery Assault
rattletrap_battery_assault.description: Some of Rattletrap's contraptions don't quite work correctly, so detonating them proves useful as an offensive maneuver.

rattletrap_power_cogs.name: Power Cogs
rattletrap_power_cogs.description: One of Clockwerk's inventions of which he is most proud is the power cog - though it is sometimes despised by his allies.

rattletrap_rocket_flare.name: Rocket Flare
rattletrap_rocket_flare.description: What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.

rattletrap_overclocking.name: Overclocking
rattletrap_overclocking.description: Rattletrap understands the limitations of his armor. Just as he understands the risks of pushing past them in times of need.

rattletrap_hookshot.name: Hookshot
rattletrap_hookshot.description: A somewhat unwieldy device, the Hookshot sends the otherwise clunky Clockwerk armor flying through the air.

leshrac_split_earth.name: Split Earth
leshrac_split_earth.description: Twisting nature to his vile will, the shifting earth consumes those unlucky enough to cross Leshrac's path.

leshrac_diabolic_edict.name: Diabolic Edict
leshrac_diabolic_edict.description: Chronoptic energy bursts from one plane to the other, evaporating anything it touches.

leshrac_lightning_storm.name: Lightning Storm
leshrac_lightning_storm.description: The Tormented Soul's mastery of the elements is evident in the massive storms that strike down armies before him.

leshrac_pulse_nova.name: Pulse Nova
leshrac_pulse_nova.description: If necessary, the Tormented Soul can manipulate space time itself, ravaging lesser beings.

special_bonus_unique_leshrac_2.description: Lightning Storm Can Bounce Twice On Units

furion_sprout.name: Sprout
furion_sprout.description: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.

furion_teleportation.name: Teleportation
furion_teleportation.description: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.

furion_force_of_nature.name: Nature's Call
furion_force_of_nature.description: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.

furion_wrath_of_nature.name: Wrath of Nature
furion_wrath_of_nature.description: Nature's Prophet calls Verodicia's fury to strike down those who might ravage the wilderness.

life_stealer_rage.name: Rage
life_stealer_rage.description: The madness and brutality of N'aix makes him a vicious and unrelenting foe in combat.

life_stealer_feast.name: Feast
life_stealer_feast.description: After escaping from his cell in Devarque, N'aix subsisted on flesh and bones of those unfortunate to cross his path.

life_stealer_open_wounds.name: Open Wounds
life_stealer_open_wounds.description: Fresh wounds and the scent of blood often draw out the scavengers to finish the job.

life_stealer_infest.name: Infest
life_stealer_infest.description: With this infestation, N'aix consumes the life blood of the host, restoring him back to full unholy power.

dark_seer_vacuum.name: Vacuum
dark_seer_vacuum.description: Ish'Kafel modifies the center of gravity to a place of his choosing.

dark_seer_ion_shell.name: Ion Shell
dark_seer_ion_shell.description: The Dark Seer slices holes into the 'Land Behind the Wall,' causing prismatic energy to seep forth.

dark_seer_surge.name: Surge
dark_seer_surge.description: Ish'Kafel once used his speed of mind to navigate the maze between the walls.

dark_seer_wall_of_replica.name: Wall of Replica
dark_seer_wall_of_replica.description: The Dark Seer, while unable to return to his natural realm, can channel part of the prismatic wall with powerful strength of mind, sowing confusion amongst enemy ranks.

clinkz_strafe.name: Burning Barrage
clinkz_strafe.description: It's hard to say whether the blur around the Bone Fletcher is from his flaming heart or his speed with the quiver.

clinkz_searing_arrows.name: Searing Arrows
clinkz_searing_arrows.description: Clinkz simply lights his arrows from his flaming essence for quite the destructive effect.

clinkz_wind_walk.name: Skeleton Walk
clinkz_wind_walk.description: With a burst of fire and puff of smoke, the Bone Fletcher was nowhere to be seen.

clinkz_burning_army.name: Burning Army
clinkz_burning_army.description: Existing on the brink of life and death, Clinkz has learned to temporarily bridge the gap between the two.

clinkz_death_pact.name: Death Pact
clinkz_death_pact.description: Sutherex' bond of life and death has become a part of Clinkz, and his old bones are refreshed with repetition of the pact on lesser beings.

omniknight_purification.name: Purification
omniknight_purification.description: Priests of the Omniscience are adept at removing impurities from fellow warriors.

omniknight_repel.name: Heavenly Grace
omniknight_repel.description: When faced with the pit of sacrifice, Purist's resilience to magic was tested and affirmed.

omniknight_degen_aura.name: Degen Aura
omniknight_degen_aura.description: The holy embodiment of Purist Thunderwrath is enough to weaken those of lesser faith.

omniknight_guardian_angel.name: Guardian Angel
omniknight_guardian_angel.description: The All Seeing One casts down his protection over those that Purist calls friend.

enchantress_impetus.name: Impetus
enchantress_impetus.description: While Aiushtha favors peaceful means, she is capable of a magical onslaught from a distance, her spears gaining energy from the natural life around her.

enchantress_enchant.name: Enchant
enchantress_enchant.description: A true steward of the forest, Aiushtha befriends all within it - from lowly trolls to powerful centaurs.

enchantress_natures_attendants.name: Nature's Attendants
enchantress_natures_attendants.description: Whimsical spirits of the woods possess a healing power that is quite subtle, but gains strength in numbers.

enchantress_untouchable.name: Untouchable
enchantress_untouchable.description: After attacking Aiushtha, most opponents are overwhelmed with guilt having attacked such a natural beauty.

huskar_inner_fire.name: Inner Fire
huskar_inner_fire.description: Not even Huskar's own flesh can contain the unending expansion of his life force.

huskar_burning_spear.name: Burning Spear
huskar_burning_spear.description: The Sacred Warrior ignites his weaponry after marking it with his own blood - causing far greater pain than he himself feels.

huskar_berserkers_blood.name: Berserker's Blood
huskar_berserkers_blood.description: After losing his birthright, Huskar gained a lethality in physical combat that is only heightened as his own blood is spilled.

huskar_life_break.name: Life Break
huskar_life_break.description: No matter the danger, Huskar thrusts himself into melees that only he can survive.

night_stalker_void.name: Void
night_stalker_void.description: Balanar creates a vortex of infinite night, tearing opponents violently into the eternal darkness that once was.

night_stalker_crippling_fear.name: Crippling Fear
night_stalker_crippling_fear.description: A vision of the twisted maw of Balanar etches itself into the minds of the poor souls unlucky enough to cross his path.

night_stalker_hunter_in_the_night.name: Hunter in the Night
night_stalker_hunter_in_the_night.description: The hunting prowess of Balanar improves as the night beckons.

night_stalker_darkness.name: Dark Ascension
night_stalker_darkness.description: It is a humbling sight to see when the mightiest of warriors become afraid of the dark.

special_bonus_unique_night_stalker_5.description: +10% Hunter In The Night Movement Speed

special_bonus_unique_night_stalker_2.description: +80 Hunter In The Night Attack Speed

broodmother_insatiable_hunger.name: Insatiable Hunger
broodmother_insatiable_hunger.description: While most of her prey is wrapped in silken cocoons and saved for her young, the Broodmother herself has a taste for wandering heroes.

broodmother_spin_web.name: Spin Web
broodmother_spin_web.description: Weaving a bed of silken fibers, Arachnia's web both protects her and her offspring, as well as giving advancing opponents a sense of foreboding.

broodmother_sticky_snare.name: Spinner's Snare
broodmother_sticky_snare.description: The slightest tremor of her web is all Arachnia needs to find her prey.

broodmother_spawn_spiderlings.name: Spawn Spiderlings
broodmother_spawn_spiderlings.description: Black Arachnia continues to raise her young, even amidst the field of combat.  The brood quickly learns how to support their mother.

bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss.name: Shuriken Toss
bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss.description: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.

bounty_hunter_jinada.name: Jinada
bounty_hunter_jinada.description: Gondar's vast experience ensures he never walks away from a transaction empty-handed.

bounty_hunter_wind_walk.name: Shadow Walk
bounty_hunter_wind_walk.description: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.

bounty_hunter_track.name: Track
bounty_hunter_track.description: Using his elevated senses of sight and smell, Gondar's hits have quite a good chance of success.

special_bonus_unique_bounty_hunter_6.description: Half Track Bonus Speed to Allies

weaver_the_swarm.name: The Swarm
weaver_the_swarm.description: Skitskurr opens a gap in the space time fabric, allowing young Weavers to slip through and aid him in combat.

weaver_shukuchi.name: Shukuchi
weaver_shukuchi.description: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.

weaver_geminate_attack.name: Geminate Attack
weaver_geminate_attack.description: Skitskurr's relationship with time is somewhat variable, causing his actions to be witnessed - and felt - more than once.

weaver_time_lapse.name: Time Lapse
weaver_time_lapse.description: If Skitskurr does not deem the current reality of the world to fit his desires, he simply crawls back in time to right what was wronged.

jakiro_dual_breath.name: Dual Breath
jakiro_dual_breath.description: Pyrexae dragons have tremendously dangerous breath for each branch of the species; combining them is unimaginable.

jakiro_ice_path.name: Ice Path
jakiro_ice_path.description: Jakiro's cunning right head calls upon its frozen heritage, glazing the earth with blistering cold.

jakiro_liquid_fire.name: Liquid Fire
jakiro_liquid_fire.description: The left maw of Jakiro opens, laying waste to any in its path.

jakiro_macropyre.name: Macropyre
jakiro_macropyre.description: Ice and fire combine to rip the battlefield to shreds with extreme temperatures.

batrider_sticky_napalm.name: Sticky Napalm
batrider_sticky_napalm.description: It's not uncommon to hear the Rider cackle while he increases the flammability of his opponents.

batrider_flamebreak.name: Flamebreak
batrider_flamebreak.description: A molotov cocktail is the weapon of choice for Batrider.

batrider_firefly.name: Firefly
batrider_firefly.description: When an enemy escapes into the Yama Raskav Jungle, most would cut through the brush to find the fugitive.  Batrider just chooses to destroy the jungle along with his foes.

batrider_flaming_lasso.name: Flaming Lasso
batrider_flaming_lasso.description: Few dare to ask to ride on the bat, as Batrider gives them free of charge.

chen_penitence.name: Penitence
chen_penitence.description: Although Chen's brand of animal enthrallment isn't quite strong enough to control the minds of enemy heroes, it still tests their resolve in combat.

chen_holy_persuasion.name: Holy Persuasion
chen_holy_persuasion.description: Although they may not be knights, Chen incorporates beasts into the Fold in the same way he himself was converted.

chen_divine_favor.name: Divine Favor
chen_divine_favor.description: Chen's zeal is infectious, blessing his allies with vitality and compelling them to his side.

chen_hand_of_god.name: Hand of God
chen_hand_of_god.description: Using the mental link with his thralls, Chen calls down restoration and well-being to those who share his fanaticism.

special_bonus_unique_chen_1.description: +3 Holy Persuasion Max Units and Charges

spectre_spectral_dagger.name: Spectral Dagger
spectre_spectral_dagger.description: Mercurial's dagger eclipses the physical plane in shadow, a state in which mortals cower, but spectres thrive.

spectre_desolate.name: Desolate
spectre_desolate.description: Often times, warriors find themselves alone with a vision of Mercurial - the fated question is if it is the true Spectre.

spectre_dispersion.name: Dispersion
spectre_dispersion.description: A daunting task lies before enemies of Mercurial - killing a shadow with blade and magic.

spectre_reality.name: Reality
spectre_reality.description: The scattered shadows unite into the one true Spectre.

spectre_haunt_single.name: Shadow Step
spectre_haunt_single.description: With great focus of will, Mercurial can sometimes limit the extent of her division.

spectre_haunt.name: Haunt
spectre_haunt.description: At the height of combat, Mercurial's physical manifestation shatters, and the shadowy pieces haunt those who still cling to life.

doom_bringer_devour.name: Devour
doom_bringer_devour.description: Lucifer's appetite and greed are never sated.

doom_bringer_scorched_earth.name: Scorched Earth
doom_bringer_scorched_earth.description: The Fallen One spreads destruction in his wake, sparing none from the flame which sustains him.

doom_bringer_infernal_blade.name: Infernal Blade
doom_bringer_infernal_blade.description: Lucifer shares the fire branding bestowed upon him at the time of his exile.

doom_bringer_doom.name: Doom
doom_bringer_doom.description: When a name is tolled from the bell of Vashundol, doom is sure to follow.

ancient_apparition_cold_feet.name: Cold Feet
ancient_apparition_cold_feet.description: Kaldr's presence draws those around him into a frozen void, threatening to lock them in an icy prison for eternity.

ancient_apparition_ice_vortex.name: Ice Vortex
ancient_apparition_ice_vortex.description: Frozen, caustic winds are at the whim of Kaldr, chilling the field of battle.

ancient_apparition_chilling_touch.name: Chilling Touch
ancient_apparition_chilling_touch.description: The Ancient Apparition's eternal knowledge brings a frigid enchantment to his attacks.

ancient_apparition_ice_blast.name: Ice Blast
ancient_apparition_ice_blast.description: Ice storms from ages past flow through Kaldr's frosty limbs, crashing into the world and turning its inhabitants into monuments to his eternal power.

ursa_earthshock.name: Earthshock
ursa_earthshock.description: The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.

ursa_overpower.name: Overpower
ursa_overpower.description: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.

ursa_fury_swipes.name: Fury Swipes
ursa_fury_swipes.description: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.

ursa_enrage.name: Enrage
ursa_enrage.description: Ulfsaar succumbs to his ancient spirit, becoming the most ferocious creature on the battlefield.

spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness.name: Charge of Darkness
spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness.description: Barathrum erupts from the darkness with unwieldy force.

spirit_breaker_bulldoze.name: Bulldoze
spirit_breaker_bulldoze.description: Barathrum warps the fabric of reality around him, lessening its influence on his physical form.

spirit_breaker_greater_bash.name: Greater Bash
spirit_breaker_greater_bash.description: The signature strike of Barathrum's ghostly ball and chain.

spirit_breaker_nether_strike.name: Nether Strike
spirit_breaker_nether_strike.description: Barathrum temporarily returns to the realm from where he came, bringing with him the retribution of both worlds.

gyrocopter_rocket_barrage.name: Rocket Barrage
gyrocopter_rocket_barrage.description: Aurel's new craft has an increased payload for rockets, enhancing their rapid-fire capabilities.

gyrocopter_homing_missile.name: Homing Missile
gyrocopter_homing_missile.description: The biggest missile Aurel could possibly attach to his craft, The Bomb has carefully calculated aerodynamics and explosives for maximum impact.

gyrocopter_flak_cannon.name: Flak Cannon
gyrocopter_flak_cannon.description: This newly revamped Gyrocopter has attached enough armaments to assault in a 360 degree radius.

alchemist_acid_spray.name: Acid Spray
alchemist_acid_spray.description: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.

alchemist_unstable_concoction.name: Unstable Concoction
alchemist_unstable_concoction.description: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.

alchemist_goblins_greed.name: Greevil's Greed
alchemist_goblins_greed.description: While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.

alchemist_chemical_rage.name: Chemical Rage
alchemist_chemical_rage.description: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.

invoker_invoke.name: Invoke
invoker_invoke.description: So begins a new age of knowledge.

silencer_curse_of_the_silent.name: Arcane Curse
silencer_curse_of_the_silent.description: Nortrom's lack of incantations is less of a problem for him than it is for his adversaries.

silencer_glaives_of_wisdom.name: Glaives of Wisdom
silencer_glaives_of_wisdom.description: Although lacking in traditional incantations, Nortrom's pedigree of the Aeol Drias gives him uncanny wisdom, which he applies to physical combat.

silencer_last_word.name: Last Word
silencer_last_word.description: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.

silencer_global_silence.name: Global Silence
silencer_global_silence.description: With a shock to the ground, all magic and sound pauses, and Nortrom fulfills his prophecy.

obsidian_destroyer_arcane_orb.name: Arcane Orb
obsidian_destroyer_arcane_orb.description: Harbinger's outworldly knowledge allows it to tap into the ebb and flow of all spiritual energy, infusing it into his being.

obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment.name: Astral Imprisonment
obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment.description: Locked away in the pocket between this world and the Outworld, victims realize their infantile knowledge and mortality.

obsidian_destroyer_equilibrium.name: Essence Flux
obsidian_destroyer_equilibrium.description: The Outworld is awash in arcane energy, inclined to diffuse through any of Harbinger's rifts.

obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse.name: Sanity's Eclipse
obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse.description: When an Outworld crystal ruptures, cataclysmic energies are released, and the reverberations of this power are felt interdimensionally.

lycan_summon_wolves.name: Summon Wolves
lycan_summon_wolves.description: The very enchantment that twisted his being also summons canine familiars.

lycan_howl.name: Howl
lycan_howl.description: Blood-curdling wolf cries signal to opponents that Banehallow is among them.

lycan_feral_impulse.name: Feral Impulse
lycan_feral_impulse.description: His animalistic symbiosis with canine kind gives Banehallow enhanced reflexes and hunting capabilities.

lycan_shapeshift.name: Shapeshift
lycan_shapeshift.description: Forever a slave to his lycanthropy, Banehallow has come to accept his curse, and embrace his own savagery.

brewmaster_thunder_clap.name: Thunder Clap
brewmaster_thunder_clap.description: A slam of Mangix' mighty keg starts the festivities.

brewmaster_cinder_brew.name: Cinder Brew
brewmaster_cinder_brew.description: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!

brewmaster_drunken_brawler.name: Drunken Brawler
brewmaster_drunken_brawler.description: When Mangix won his title as the Brewmaster of the Order of Oyo, he also claimed his place in the mastery of inebriation.

brewmaster_primal_split.name: Primal Split
brewmaster_primal_split.description: It isn't clear whether Mangix is consciously aware of his potent bond with nature, as it often occurs in the midst of a drunken stupor.

shadow_demon_disruption.name: Disruption
shadow_demon_disruption.description: The pain of deception comes not while it happens, but when it is revealed.

shadow_demon_soul_catcher.name: Soul Catcher
shadow_demon_soul_catcher.description: Trying to resist the Shadow Demon's corruption is mostly a useless endeavor.

shadow_demon_shadow_poison.name: Shadow Poison
shadow_demon_shadow_poison.description: The ever growing influence of the Shadow Demon can pollute the most valiant and pure of heroes.

shadow_demon_demonic_purge.name: Demonic Purge
shadow_demon_demonic_purge.description: Once Shadow Demon no longer has any need for his collected cultist, he releases it from its subservience - and its life.

lone_druid_spirit_bear.name: Summon Spirit Bear
lone_druid_spirit_bear.description: Sylla's lifelong companion is symbiotic with his spirit and heart, coming to aid him in any time of need.

lone_druid_spirit_link.name: Spirit Link
lone_druid_spirit_link.description: Sylla is emboldened by the presence of his companion, his vitality replenished with each swipe of the Spirit Bear's claws.

lone_druid_savage_roar.name: Savage Roar
lone_druid_savage_roar.description: Sylla studies and masters the arts of the lost Bear Clan, enhancing his attunement with the wild.

lone_druid_true_form.name: True Form
lone_druid_true_form.description: The mighty bear is the king of the forest, possessing the throne through raw power.

special_bonus_unique_lone_druid_7.description: +1000 True Form and Spirit Bear Health

chaos_knight_chaos_bolt.name: Chaos Bolt
chaos_knight_chaos_bolt.description: Even Chaos Knight cannot predict this manifest of unholy energy.

chaos_knight_reality_rift.name: Reality Rift
chaos_knight_reality_rift.description: Armageddon rides between the planes, bringing Chaos Knight to his victim wherever he may hide.

chaos_knight_chaos_strike.name: Chaos Strike
chaos_knight_chaos_strike.description: Chaos Knight's unwieldy power bludgeons those who stand before him, crushing the thickest of armors.

chaos_knight_phantasm.name: Phantasm
chaos_knight_phantasm.description: Drawing on his battles fought across many worlds and many times, phantasms of the Chaos Knight rise up to quell all who oppose him.

meepo_earthbind.name: Earthbind
meepo_earthbind.description: Catching dinner in the Riftshadow Ruins can be quite the task.

meepo_poof.name: Poof
meepo_poof.description: Sometimes breaking one of the Riftshadow Crystals can be just the trick for getting yourself out of a bind.  Or your other self.

meepo_ransack.name: Ransack
meepo_ransack.description: So you gonna need that, or...?

treant_natures_grasp.name: Nature's Grasp
treant_natures_grasp.description: The Protectors don't often come into vision; their natural state being nestled within their leafy brethren.

treant_leech_seed.name: Leech Seed
treant_leech_seed.description: Rooftrellen nurtures the beings under his stewardship, sustained by the lifeforce of trespassers into his sacred ground.

treant_living_armor.name: Living Armor
treant_living_armor.description: The roots and tendrils of the Treant Protectors are far-reaching, stimulating the growth and rejuvenation of all of nature.

treant_eyes_in_the_forest.name: Eyes In The Forest
treant_eyes_in_the_forest.description: One can never be too certain who, or what, might need protecting.

treant_natures_guise.name: Nature's Guise
treant_natures_guise.description: The Protectors don't often come into vision; their natural state being nestled within their leafy brethren.

treant_overgrowth.name: Overgrowth
treant_overgrowth.description: Rooftrellen calls the ancestral spirit of nature, releasing its power through all of his kin.

ogre_magi_fireblast.name: Fireblast
ogre_magi_fireblast.description: The Ogre Magi is easily amused, entertained for hours by playing with fire.

ogre_magi_bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
ogre_magi_bloodlust.description: 'Running's not as fun as hitting... Not one bit fun.'

ogre_magi_unrefined_fireblast.name: Unrefined Fireblast
ogre_magi_unrefined_fireblast.description: The 'who-casts-spell-first' argument between himself is solved simply by both casting at once.

ogre_magi_multicast.name: Multicast
ogre_magi_multicast.description: Despite being largely incapacitated by his IQ, the Ogre Magi's success in battle is attributed to pure skill.

undying_decay.name: Decay
undying_decay.description: The strength of the living is simply borrowed from the strength of the dead.

undying_soul_rip.name: Soul Rip
undying_soul_rip.description: Even allies feel despair in Undying's presence.

undying_tombstone.name: Tombstone
undying_tombstone.description: Dirge calls on his fallen brothers to fight for the Dead God.

undying_flesh_golem.name: Flesh Golem
undying_flesh_golem.description: The flesh of the recently dead add to the power of Dirge's plague.

rubick_telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
rubick_telekinesis.description: Even the Grandest Magus may use his powers for enjoyment.

rubick_fade_bolt.name: Fade Bolt
rubick_fade_bolt.description: Rubick's favorite spell for dispatching would-be assassins is a rather simple conjuration.

rubick_arcane_supremacy.name: Arcane Supremacy
rubick_arcane_supremacy.description: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...

rubick_spell_steal.name: Spell Steal
rubick_spell_steal.description: ...but even their lesser magics can be a source of much utility.

disruptor_thunder_strike.name: Thunder Strike
disruptor_thunder_strike.description: Disruptor's charged coils occasionally overload, and a singed armor plate or tuft of fur is the enemy's result.

disruptor_glimpse.name: Glimpse
disruptor_glimpse.description: Playing with electricity can have unexpected results.

disruptor_kinetic_field.name: Kinetic Field
disruptor_kinetic_field.description: The stryder is immune to the gale-force winds that will consume its adversaries.

disruptor_static_storm.name: Static Storm
disruptor_static_storm.description: A summer squall in Druud is a hardship that only an Oglodi can survive.

nyx_assassin_impale.name: Impale
nyx_assassin_impale.description: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.

nyx_assassin_mana_burn.name: Mana Burn
nyx_assassin_mana_burn.description: The tome in Ultimyr describes one scarab with the ability eat away at the mind of lesser beings.

nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace.name: Spiked Carapace
nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace.description: While their carapace is relatively thin, it's guarded by a retractable field of razor-sharp spikes.

nyx_assassin_burrow.name: Burrow
nyx_assassin_burrow.description: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.

nyx_assassin_vendetta.name: Vendetta
nyx_assassin_vendetta.description: The scarab kills for the glory of his queen.

nyx_assassin_unburrow.name: Unburrow
nyx_assassin_unburrow.description: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.

naga_siren_mirror_image.name: Mirror Image
naga_siren_mirror_image.description: Slithice, while being strong in her own right, is notoriously hard to track down.

naga_siren_ensnare.name: Ensnare
naga_siren_ensnare.description: The only way to escape the onslaught of a Slithereen is to never oppose one in the first place.

naga_siren_rip_tide.name: Rip Tide
naga_siren_rip_tide.description: A torrent from the Deep Ones crushes the defenses of the Siren's enemies.

naga_siren_song_of_the_siren.name: Song of the Siren
naga_siren_song_of_the_siren.description: Slithice's powerful voice enchants leagues of opponents, while calling her Slithereen kin in a time of need.

keeper_of_the_light_illuminate.name: Illuminate
keeper_of_the_light_illuminate.description: Ezalor's hidden light reveals itself in marvelous fashion.

keeper_of_the_light_chakra_magic.name: Chakra Magic
keeper_of_the_light_chakra_magic.description: In the same vein, Ezalor bestows his harmony among others.

keeper_of_the_light_blinding_light.name: Blinding Light
keeper_of_the_light_blinding_light.description: The Primordial light turns the tides of battle in favor of Ezalor and his allies.

keeper_of_the_light_will_o_wisp.name: Will-O-Wisp
keeper_of_the_light_will_o_wisp.description: Though he would not claim to 'know' them, Ezalor holds an uncanny influence over many powerful creatures always willing to come to his aid.

keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form.name: Spirit Form
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form.description: In a flash of light, Ezalor reveals his true nature.

keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form_illumina.name: Illuminate
keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form_illumina.description: Ezalor's hidden light reveals itself in marvelous fashion.

wisp_tether.name: Tether
wisp_tether.description: The benevolent touch of Io brings strength from between the planes.

wisp_spirits.name: Spirits
wisp_spirits.description: Io twists the particles of the universe with its unimaginable capabilities.

wisp_overcharge.name: Overcharge
wisp_overcharge.description: Drawing on the energy of matter from all worlds, Io begins the unravelling of time.

wisp_relocate.name: Relocate
wisp_relocate.description: Io is the embodiment of the mystery of the universe.

visage_grave_chill.name: Grave Chill
visage_grave_chill.description: The warmth of the sun is never felt in the dark cold of the Narrow Maze.

visage_soul_assumption.name: Soul Assumption
visage_soul_assumption.description: The collected souls of the dead reach out to bring another into their fold.

visage_gravekeepers_cloak.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
visage_gravekeepers_cloak.description: Visage's tough scales share equal properties of ghost and stone, making it nearly impervious to blade and magical assault.

visage_summon_familiars.name: Summon Familiars
visage_summon_familiars.description: Guardians of the Narrow Maze, Necro'lic's Familiars stand watch over his domain.

slark_dark_pact.name: Dark Pact
slark_dark_pact.description: Slithereen are capable of quickly regrowing appendages, in case of critical injury, to save their own lives.

slark_pounce.name: Pounce
slark_pounce.description: Time in the Dark Reef made Slark a dangerous assassin; aggressive and fearless.

slark_essence_shift.name: Essence Shift
slark_essence_shift.description: With each strike at his adversaries, Slark's knowledge of their weaknesses improves.

slark_shadow_dance.name: Shadow Dance
slark_shadow_dance.description: The hidden Thirteenth is a slippery foe.

special_bonus_unique_slark_5.description: +1 Agility gain/stolen per Essence Shift Stack

medusa_split_shot.name: Split Shot
medusa_split_shot.description: All who encounter the cursed Gorgon will feel her rage.

medusa_mystic_snake.name: Mystic Snake
medusa_mystic_snake.description: The Gorgon's curse is her greatest strength.

medusa_mana_shield.name: Mana Shield
medusa_mana_shield.description: While Medusa was not gifted with eternal life upon birth, her curse bestowed her with impressive defensive powers.

medusa_stone_gaze.name: Stone Gaze
medusa_stone_gaze.description: The beauty of Medusa is legendary.

troll_warlord_berserkers_rage.name: Berserker's Rage
troll_warlord_berserkers_rage.description: Like his anger, Troll Warlord's supply of axes is infinite.

troll_warlord_whirling_axes_ranged.name: Whirling Axes (Ranged)
troll_warlord_whirling_axes_ranged.description: Only axes fueled by hate whirl with such a deadly spin.

troll_warlord_fervor.name: Fervor
troll_warlord_fervor.description: If at first you don't succeed, strike, strike again.

troll_warlord_battle_trance.name: Battle Trance
troll_warlord_battle_trance.description: An adrenaline rush of pure hatred quickens your blades.

centaur_hoof_stomp.name: Hoof Stomp
centaur_hoof_stomp.description: When the mighty hoof of the Warrunner touches soil, the tremors are felt far and wide.

centaur_double_edge.name: Double Edge
centaur_double_edge.description: In the spurs of combat, Bradwarden's vicious strikes sometimes cause self-inflicted collateral damage.

centaur_return.name: Retaliate
centaur_return.description: Bradwarden has no need to parry his opponent's attacks; his armor-like hide does it for him.

centaur_stampede.name: Stampede
centaur_stampede.description: The great belt of Omexe, which labels Bradwarden as the greatest warrior of his kind, incites his fellow gladiators to follow him into barbarous combat.

magnataur_shockwave.name: Shockwave
magnataur_shockwave.description: Mt. Joerlak was a somewhat unstable mass, and Magnus has learned to channel its reverberations.

magnataur_empower.name: Empower
magnataur_empower.description: With a deep bellow, Magnus displays his true power.

magnataur_skewer.name: Skewer
magnataur_skewer.description: Magnoceros horns are valuable in direct proportion to their danger to prospective merchants.

magnataur_reverse_polarity.name: Reverse Polarity
magnataur_reverse_polarity.description: Magnus fights with the fury of the erupting Mt. Joerlak.

shredder_whirling_death.name: Whirling Death
shredder_whirling_death.description: In the case that Rizzrack gets surrounded by the vines and plants of his nightmares, he has an immediate chainsaw defense.

shredder_timber_chain.name: Timber Chain
shredder_timber_chain.description: You never know when you might need to escape from malevolent saplings.

shredder_reactive_armor.name: Reactive Armor
shredder_reactive_armor.description: The saw-suit is equipped to react to the slightest touch with fortified defenses.

shredder_chakram_2.name: Second Chakram
shredder_chakram_2.description: Cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut!

bristleback_viscous_nasal_goo.name: Viscous Nasal Goo
bristleback_viscous_nasal_goo.description: Having caught a cold while stuck in the snow, Bristleback turns it to his advantage.

bristleback_quill_spray.name: Quill Spray
bristleback_quill_spray.description: An enforcer's honor can be a prickly thing.  So can his quills.

bristleback_bristleback.name: Bristleback
bristleback_bristleback.description: Turning his back to a fight might be just the thing.

bristleback_warpath.name: Warpath
bristleback_warpath.description: 'Temper, temper,' his mum always chided.  But in a fight, a temper can come in handy.

tusk_ice_shards.name: Ice Shards
tusk_ice_shards.description: In the frozen tundra near the Barrier, after the last sun of autumn has set, ice can form with alarming speed.

tusk_snowball.name: Snowball
tusk_snowball.description: Tales are still told of the wild feat that ended the grand brawl at White Fields.

tusk_tag_team.name: Tag Team
tusk_tag_team.description: Even far from Cobalt, Tusk carries the 'Barrier Chill' in his very bones.

tusk_walrus_punch.name: Walrus PUNCH!
tusk_walrus_punch.description: It never matters who throws the first punch, only who throws the last.

skywrath_mage_arcane_bolt.name: Arcane Bolt
skywrath_mage_arcane_bolt.description: Within the Ghastly Eyrie's endless intrigue, only the clever and calm can hope to survive.

skywrath_mage_concussive_shot.name: Concussive Shot
skywrath_mage_concussive_shot.description: Those who serve the court of the Ghastly Eyrie are ever locked in covert war. One must always know where danger lurks nearest.

skywrath_mage_ancient_seal.name: Ancient Seal
skywrath_mage_ancient_seal.description: A holy incantation, whosoever finds themselves touched by Avilliva's sigil must suffer in penitent silence.

skywrath_mage_mystic_flare.name: Mystic Flare
skywrath_mage_mystic_flare.description: Only the most practiced of Skywrath sorcerers could hope to shape the skies into such a storm.

abaddon_death_coil.name: Mist Coil
abaddon_death_coil.description: A mysterious vapor from the Font of Avernus now infuses the breath of Abaddon, who releases it at will.

abaddon_aphotic_shield.name: Aphotic Shield
abaddon_aphotic_shield.description: The powers of the black mist rise to absorb attacks like the black mist absorbs light.

abaddon_frostmourne.name: Curse of Avernus
abaddon_frostmourne.description: While the baptized draw strength from the Font, the gifts of Avernus are debilitating to the uninitiated.

abaddon_borrowed_time.name: Borrowed Time
abaddon_borrowed_time.description: The most unnatural of all the gifts of the Font of Avernus, this power defies mortal understanding.  What should hurt, instead heals; and what should kill gives strength anew.

elder_titan_echo_stomp.name: Echo Stomp
elder_titan_echo_stomp.description: The force of creation still echoes in the stomp of the Titan.

elder_titan_ancestral_spirit.name: Astral Spirit
elder_titan_ancestral_spirit.description: Like the four fundamentals, Elder Titan exists across all planes at once and can draw other aspects of himself to assist in times of need.

elder_titan_natural_order.name: Natural Order
elder_titan_natural_order.description: As it was at the beginning, Elder Titan makes it so again.

elder_titan_earth_splitter.name: Earth Splitter
elder_titan_earth_splitter.description: That which he created, the titan tears asunder.

legion_commander_overwhelming_odds.name: Overwhelming Odds
legion_commander_overwhelming_odds.description: The archers of Stonehall are ready at Tresdin's command.

legion_commander_press_the_attack.name: Press The Attack
legion_commander_press_the_attack.description: The rallying horn of the Bronze Legion is able to inspire any heart.

legion_commander_moment_of_courage.name: Moment of Courage
legion_commander_moment_of_courage.description: Tresdin knows that an enemy's most vulnerable moment often follows their fiercest stroke.

legion_commander_duel.name: Duel
legion_commander_duel.description: To face a soldier of Stonehall in single combat is a challenge few can resist.

ember_spirit_searing_chains.name: Searing Chains
ember_spirit_searing_chains.description: Xin's harshest lessons often employed the use of red-hot chains.

ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist.name: Sleight of Fist
ember_spirit_sleight_of_fist.description: The studied warrior must whip and weave through its enemies, burning each without pause.

ember_spirit_flame_guard.name: Flame Guard
ember_spirit_flame_guard.description: An enemy should never be allowed to approach without difficulty.

ember_spirit_activate_fire_remnant.name: Activate Fire Remnant
ember_spirit_activate_fire_remnant.description: With blazing speed does a spirit fly!

ember_spirit_fire_remnant.name: Fire Remnant
ember_spirit_fire_remnant.description: By the spirit's power are Xin's teachings spread anew.

earth_spirit_boulder_smash.name: Boulder Smash
earth_spirit_boulder_smash.description: It is with the power of a mountain that Earth Spirit strikes his enemies.

earth_spirit_rolling_boulder.name: Rolling Boulder
earth_spirit_rolling_boulder.description: Calling upon his connection to the land, the Earth Spirit draws loose stone to him, which forms a protective ball that he can use to roll short distances.

earth_spirit_geomagnetic_grip.name: Geomagnetic Grip
earth_spirit_geomagnetic_grip.description: Like calls to like. Even the minerals found in the blood and bones of living beings are not immune to the call of the Earth Spirit.

earth_spirit_stone_caller.name: Stone Remnant
earth_spirit_stone_caller.description: Earth Spirit calls forth a remnant of his stone army, long buried with him in the dark embrace of the Earth.

earth_spirit_petrify.name: Enchant Remnant
earth_spirit_petrify.description: Kaolin uses the elemental power of the Earth to temporarily petrify living beings, so that they might be conscripted into his stone funerary army.

earth_spirit_magnetize.name: Magnetize
earth_spirit_magnetize.description: At the Earth Spirit's call, the minerals in the blood and bones of his enemies rebel against the bodies they find themselves in.

terrorblade_reflection.name: Reflection
terrorblade_reflection.description: In the fractal prison of Foulfell, Terrorblade learned the truth of this old tale: you are your own worst enemy.  Now it is a lesson he teaches others.

terrorblade_conjure_image.name: Conjure Image
terrorblade_conjure_image.description: There's only one thing more dangerous than facing Terrorblade.  Facing MORE Terrorblades!

terrorblade_metamorphosis.name: Metamorphosis
terrorblade_metamorphosis.description: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.

terrorblade_sunder.name: Sunder
terrorblade_sunder.description: You didn't need that life, did you?  The demon marauder steals that which you hold most dear.

phoenix_icarus_dive.name: Icarus Dive
phoenix_icarus_dive.description: Though no stranger to travelling the cosmic void, soaring within an atmosphere offers unique pleasures.

phoenix_fire_spirits.name: Fire Spirits
phoenix_fire_spirits.description: The ever-collapsing core of Phoenix often emits short-lived bursts of conscious light.

phoenix_sun_ray.name: Sun Ray
phoenix_sun_ray.description: The vent through which such stellar energy flows is mere atoms wide.

phoenix_supernova.name: Supernova
phoenix_supernova.description: The solar crucible of a Supernova may be fatal, yet from its flames arise new beacons to wander infinity.

oracle_fortunes_end.name: Fortune's End
oracle_fortunes_end.description: The astral orb crackles with power while raw energy lances out, temporarily disrupting an enemy's connection to their own body.

oracle_fates_edict.name: Fate's Edict
oracle_fates_edict.description: An unbreakable prophecy resounds: a chosen ally shall briefly suffer no magics.  Other kinds of suffering however...

oracle_purifying_flames.name: Purifying Flames
oracle_purifying_flames.description: Like a hall of mirrors might amplify the light of a single candle, the shattered walls of the universe can transform the light of prophecy into a burning torch.

oracle_false_promise.name: False Promise
oracle_false_promise.description: Foes and false prophets oft make lies of men's fates.

techies_focused_detonate.name: Focused Detonate
techies_focused_detonate.description: Why light one fuse when you can light them all?

winter_wyvern_arctic_burn.name: Arctic Burn
winter_wyvern_arctic_burn.description: The same organ where some dragons stoke their inner flame is, in Auroth, a crucible of unimaginable cold. From deep within her frosty gullet, an exhalation sends enemies into burning agony.

winter_wyvern_splinter_blast.name: Splinter Blast
winter_wyvern_splinter_blast.description: Produced slowly by specialized vesicles in her frozen gullet, Winter Wyvern blast shards of ice at her enemies.

winter_wyvern_cold_embrace.name: Cold Embrace
winter_wyvern_cold_embrace.description: From winter's heart comes a cold, healing embrace. The ice slows the blood and allows the spell to better work its curative magic.

winter_wyvern_winters_curse.name: Winter's Curse
winter_wyvern_winters_curse.description: The oldest of the bookwurms spells, this curse lends truth to the old saw: sometimes the enemy of my enemy is my enemy still.

arc_warden_flux.name: Flux
arc_warden_flux.description: An infinitesimal fraction of the power which imprisoned the Ancients.

arc_warden_magnetic_field.name: Magnetic Field
arc_warden_magnetic_field.description: Time and space are of little consequence to one as old as Zet.

arc_warden_spark_wraith.name: Spark Wraith
arc_warden_spark_wraith.description: Lesser fragments of Zet's original self.

arc_warden_tempest_double.name: Tempest Double
arc_warden_tempest_double.description: Warped by the power of its peers, Arc Warden becomes what it despises most: disharmony.

abyssal_underlord_firestorm.name: Firestorm
abyssal_underlord_firestorm.description: The flames of conquest blaze forth from the darkest depths of the abyss.

abyssal_underlord_pit_of_malice.name: Pit of Malice
abyssal_underlord_pit_of_malice.description: Twisting into the seams of reality itself, Vrogros' manifest hatred paralyzes those who defy his will.

abyssal_underlord_atrophy_aura.name: Atrophy Aura
abyssal_underlord_atrophy_aura.description: To merely stand in the presence of the Underlord is to feel the conviction of battle sapped from one's soul.

abyssal_underlord_dark_portal.name: Fiend's Gate
abyssal_underlord_dark_portal.description: Long have the forces of the abyss been limited in reach, but with the power of Aghanim in hand, Vrogros' thirst for conquest grows only stronger.

abyssal_underlord_dark_rift.name: Dark Rift
abyssal_underlord_dark_rift.description: They come without warning, leaving fire and blood where kingdoms once flourished.

monkey_king_boundless_strike.name: Boundless Strike
monkey_king_boundless_strike.description: The legendary Jingu Bang grows to match its master's will, ensuring no enemy can escape the Monkey King's reach.

monkey_king_tree_dance.name: Tree Dance
monkey_king_tree_dance.description: Sun Wukong dances nimbly along the treetop canopy, always just out of arm's reach.

monkey_king_primal_spring.name: Primal Spring
monkey_king_primal_spring.description: Leaping from the safety of cover into the midst of his enemies, Sun Wukong attacks without mercy.

monkey_king_jingu_mastery.name: Jingu Mastery
monkey_king_jingu_mastery.description: Always sensitive to the moods of its master, the Jingu Bang radiates power when Sun Wukong's combat fervor is on full display.

monkey_king_wukongs_command.name: Wukong's Command
monkey_king_wukongs_command.description: Monkey King rips out a tuft of fur to blow at his enemies, charging each strand to transform into a copy of himself.

pangolier_swashbuckle.name: Swashbuckle
pangolier_swashbuckle.description: The Pangolier's blade is even nimbler than his tongue.

pangolier_shield_crash.name: Shield Crash
pangolier_shield_crash.description: Only in the midst of his enemies does the Pangolier truly thrive.

pangolier_lucky_shot.name: Lucky Shot
