pangolier_lucky_shot.description: The Pangolier's blade is guided more often by whim than reason.

pangolier_gyroshell.name: Rolling Thunder
pangolier_gyroshell.description: Where his ancestors sought only refuge, the Pangolier saw opportunity...

dark_willow_bramble_maze.name: Bramble Maze
dark_willow_bramble_maze.description: The fae realm exists all around you, merely waiting to draw you in...

dark_willow_shadow_realm.name: Shadow Realm
dark_willow_shadow_realm.description: What you can't see will most definitely hurt you.

dark_willow_cursed_crown.name: Cursed Crown
dark_willow_cursed_crown.description: Didn't anyone ever tell you? Never strike a deal with a fairy...

dark_willow_bedlam.name: Bedlam
dark_willow_bedlam.description: You'll have to excuse my friend Jex. He's really into murder.

dark_willow_terrorize.name: Terrorize
dark_willow_terrorize.description: You think you know the first thing about fear? Jex'll show you what that word truly means...

grimstroke_dark_artistry.name: Stroke of Fate
grimstroke_dark_artistry.description: The corruptive force of Grimstroke's ink, drawn from the reservoir of his fallen people, consumes any enemy caught in its path.

grimstroke_ink_creature.name: Phantom's Embrace
grimstroke_ink_creature.description: Grimstroke holds no sorrow for the downfall of his people. Only for Yaovhi, she who was most dear to him, does he feel even a semblance of longing.

grimstroke_spirit_walk.name: Ink Swell
grimstroke_spirit_walk.description: Now that the rise of the ink tide no longer threatens to overwhelm Grimstroke, its tendrils of power are never far from his hand.

grimstroke_dark_portrait.name: Dark Portrait
grimstroke_dark_portrait.description: No dark creation is beyond the skill of the master's hand.

grimstroke_soul_chain.name: Soulbind
grimstroke_soul_chain.description: The Ascended were chosen sons of Ashkavor, granted immense power by the bonds forged between their own souls and those they were charged with protecting. In the years that followed the ruination of his kin, Grimstroke discovered much more sinister applications for the binding rituals...

mars_spear.name: Spear of Mars
mars_spear.description: The legendary Spear of Mars still glows with the heat of the forge god's fires.

mars_gods_rebuke.name: God's Rebuke
mars_gods_rebuke.description: There isn't a warrior alive who can stand unmoved by the sting of Mars' rebuke.

mars_bulwark.name: Bulwark
mars_bulwark.description: Only the very foolish dare to fight fair with the god of war.

mars_arena_of_blood.name: Arena Of Blood
mars_arena_of_blood.description: The long-dead members of the Ash Legion, assembled from the finest warriors to ever test the might of Mars, still revel in the thrill of combat, gladly beholden to the hand that fell them for as long as he so commands.

special_bonus_unique_mars_arena_of_blood.description: Arena Of Blood Grants Team +180 HP Regen

void_spirit_aether_remnant.name: Aether Remnant
void_spirit_aether_remnant.description: Inai exists far beyond the scope of a single point in space and time.

void_spirit_dissimilate.name: Dissimilate
void_spirit_dissimilate.description: Inai much prefers to observe our plane free from the confines of corporeal form.

void_spirit_resonant_pulse.name: Resonant Pulse
void_spirit_resonant_pulse.description: Inai never hesitates to shroud himself in the essence of his true self when forced to interact with the mortal plane.

void_spirit_astral_step.name: Astral Step
void_spirit_astral_step.description: A small step for Inai creates great devastation on the mortal plane.

snapfire_scatterblast.name: Scatterblast
snapfire_scatterblast.description: A favorite from her collection, Beadie crafted Ol' Rackatee as her first line of defense when she ventured into the Outlands.

snapfire_firesnap_cookie.name: Firesnap Cookie
snapfire_firesnap_cookie.description: With the help of a secret mixture that pairs Beadie's baking skills with her passion for black powder, these battle biscuits pack a punch.

snapfire_lil_shredder.name: Lil' Shredder
snapfire_lil_shredder.description: Beadie constantly tinkers with a design she first dreamed up plotting an exodus from her old gang.

snapfire_mortimer_kisses.name: Mortimer Kisses
snapfire_mortimer_kisses.description: Little did Beadie know when she adopted Mortimer, dragon toads--which aren't even toads at all--share more than just a name with their distant draconic cousins.

special_bonus_unique_snapfire_6.description: Lil' Shredder Uses Your Attack Damage

hoodwink_acorn_shot.name: Acorn Shot
hoodwink_acorn_shot.description: Though she'll make do with almost anything, Oak and Ironwood acorns make the most effective projectiles -- and the bulk of Hoodwink's stash.

hoodwink_bushwhack.name: Bushwhack
hoodwink_bushwhack.description: Hoodwink favors Ironwood groves for ambushes, but the wary step carefully in all areas of the mistwoods.

hoodwink_scurry.name: Scurry
hoodwink_scurry.description: There's not a nook or cranny in the Wood Tomo'kan out of reach of Hoodwink's paws.

hoodwink_sharpshooter.name: Sharpshooter
hoodwink_sharpshooter.description: While her first arbalest was a chance discovery, Hoodwink now takes great care in carving and caring for her own -- of course with some necessary components pilfered or otherwise cleverly procured.

dawnbreaker_fire_wreath.name: Starbreaker
dawnbreaker_fire_wreath.description: Across the vast lineage of star progeny, there were multitudes unwilling to align with the aims of the Children of Light. To those who dared organize defiance, the Children would dispatch Valora and her hammer to show a measure of their power--to leave the rebels either shattered or set back to rights.

dawnbreaker_celestial_hammer.name: Celestial Hammer
dawnbreaker_celestial_hammer.description: The Brightmaul is Valora's oldest companion and sole remaining connection to the glow of her creators.

dawnbreaker_solar_guardian.name: Solar Guardian
dawnbreaker_solar_guardian.description: Only in defense of an ally will Valora relent to call upon the last reserves of her old powers that still allow cosmic flight.

marci_grapple.name: Dispose
marci_grapple.description: Marci excels at removing obstacles from Princess Mirana's path.

marci_companion_run.name: Rebound
marci_companion_run.description: With a friendly or brazen boost, Marci can find her way into the midst of any fight.

marci_guardian.name: Sidekick
marci_guardian.description: Marci learned at a young age that the best asset in a scrap is a steady companion.

marci_unleash.name: Unleash
marci_unleash.description: Though some have sought to understand its origins, Marci rebuffs all attempts to divine the source of her power.
